name: Friday Night Funkin’ Full Ass-Game [Fanmade] DEMO
name_original: Friday Night Funkin’ Full Ass-Game [Fanmade] DEMO
description:
Getting Fanmade on a Friday Night Yay!

Friday Night Funkin’ The full-ass game [Fanmade] DEMO is here! And yes on itch.IO and I hope you like it and here is what’s here!

Features:

-New note effects

-Faster tutorial on normal mode

-New dad and bf icons

-New coler for sick, good, bad, and shit

-New colors for three, two, one, go!

-and the word combo

Note:

There is no mod weeks yet sorry there still getting put in for the full demo so this is the demo of the demo so that is all it has and there will be recharts in the next update for the demo so I hope you will like that when it is done!
